text: This page covers all the important events in the sport of tennis in 1997. Primarily, it provides the results of notable tournaments throughout the year on both the ATP and WTA Tours, the Davis Cup, and the Fed Cup. ==ITF== ===Grand Slam events=== ====Australian Open==== *Men's singles: Pete Sampras def.
